english_example_sentence: The guests are having a pleasant conversation in the comfortable armchair where you sat.
russian_example_sentence: Гости приятно беседуют в удобном кресле, где вы сидели.
turkish_example_sentence: Misafirler oturduğunuz rahat koltukta keyifli sohbet ediyor.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Misafirler ______ rahat koltukta keyifli sohbet ediyor.
